Summary: The red craft that popped up from nowhere descends in Central Park.
Object Shape: Cylinder, Diamond, Disc, Oval, Sphere, Triangle
divs: Sighting Details I get to Central Park, to The Great Hill, the highest point possible to film the Red Craft flying back and forth. I stood there and watched it do crazy patterns. When I started filming this time, it hovers about then suddenly I descends near the Reservoir. Slowly and vanishes. After about 30 min, when I got home, It popped up again for about 40 more minutes and morphed into a Plane.. I know its sounds crazy but it did and I also have it on film.. Its been out for about 4 nights so far... For some reason it knows I'm filming it.. After 4 days of filming it you would too....
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 3 other sightings in New York on or around November 2nd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
